source.interface:
* This interface represents a mass per unit volume of a substance under * specified conditions of pressure and temperature. The system unit for * this quantity is "kg/m³" (kilogram per cubic meter). Jean-Marie Dautelle 1.0, January 14, 2006
* Holds the SI unit (Système International d'Unités) for this quantity.
<declaration type="Unit" name="UNIT" />
